snippet: Washington State machinists voted down a contract that would have kept production of the 777X in the Seattle area.
abstract: Boeing executive Raymond L Conner announces that company has no plans to reopen talks with union representing machinists in Washington State who rejected labor contract linked to company’s newest jet, the 777X airliner; says that Boeing will explore where else jet could be built.
lead_paragraph: Washington State machinists voted down a contract that would have kept production of the 777X in the Seattle area.

headline.main: At Boeing, No Plan to Revisit Negotiations With Workers
headline.print_headline: At Boeing, No Plan to Revisit Negotiations With Workers
